positions.title: Head of Product
positions.description:
As Head of the Product Management Team at appliedAI, I lead a team focused on delivering the aAI Management Suite, a successful B2B SaaS solution that helps companies manage their AI activities, emphasizing value creation, risk assessment, and compliance with the EU AI Act.

Key responsibilities include:
- Overseeing the product lifecycle and ongoing enhancements
- Engaging with customers and stakeholders to gather feedback for continuous improvement
- Aligning vision, roadmap, and KPIs to accelerate growth
- Defining product requirements and prioritizing features based on market needs and customer feedback
- Conducting competitive analysis and market research to inform product positioning and differentiation
- Developing go-to-market strategy and closely collaborating with marketing and sales teams
- Managing the internal budget and external engineering budget

positions.title: IT Strategy Consultant
positions.description:
As a IT Strategy Consultant, I specialize in delivering strategic insights and evaluations in complex IT and product landscapes for various organizations. Key projects include:

Product Due Diligence for Private Equity Company: Contributed significantly to due diligence processes at a major Private Equity firm, focusing on assessing both their portfolio and potential investment companies. My role involved evaluating the overall product including technical architecture and market alignment, providing insights for reorganization and investment decisions.

IT Strategy Assessment for major DAX Company: Worked closely with a DAX-listed company to evaluate their readiness for the 'Vision Pro' launch. This task required reviews of their development capabilities, processes, and infrastructure, ensuring they were aligned and ready for this important technology.

positions.title: Director Product Management, incapptic Connect
positions.description:
Integrated the incapptic Connect product into Ivanti's overall strategy
- Owned the product including product vision, roadmap, and backlog.
- Worked closely with the engineering team in an agile development setup to drive functionality that improve customers' benefits.
- Increased the number of customers and ARR by 100%

positions.title: Director Product Management, incapptic Connect
positions.description:
Owned the incapptic Connect product including product vision, roadmap, and backlog.
- Integrated incapptic Connect's B2B SaaS product into MobileIron's overall vision, strategy, and processes
- Led the product and the support team
- Worked closely with the engineering team in an agile development setup
- Worked cross-functionally with senior leaders and key contributors of MobileIron’s / Ivanti’s worldwide product, sales, support, professional services, tech docs, security, SaaS operations and engineering organizations to achieve the acquisition goals
- Contributed to an increase in product ARR 300%, achieving full profitability for the incapptic Connect business unit within 2 years post acquisition

positions.title: Chief Customer Officer
positions.description:
Employee #1 and key contributor at a B2B software startup which became a prominent market leader within its segment (app release automation) and got strategically acquired by NASDAQ listed MobileIron, Inc.
- Defined the product strategy to meet the needs of large enterprise customers in several European countries and the U.S.; Co-defined company strategy
- Created and reviewed user stories that increased the value of the product for the customers. Worked closely with the engineering team to get the product built according to spec
- Hired, trained, and led customer support, defined technical onboarding criteria, onboarded and supervised VARs in several European countries
- Increased product ARR to >500k EUR in less than 3 years. Grew the number of large customers and cultivated customer relationship achieving zero logo churn with steadily increasing ACVs
- Led the engineering team as interim CTO till late 2017. Collaborated closely leveraging agile methods to deliver the features customers needed
- Key contributor in the Due Diligence process. Key Employee status in the SPA

allData.headline: Head of Product
allData.summary: IT product manager with over 15 years of experience in both startups and corporate environments, recognized for proven leadership skills. Played a foundational role as Chief Product Officer in driving a B2B software startup to success, leading to its acquisition by a NASDAQ-listed Silicon Valley firm. Previously, spearheaded Deutsche Lufthansa AG's digital transformation in various leadership roles, including Senior Enterprise Architect and Director of IT. Currently serving as Head of Product for a B2B SaaS solution focused on AI value and compliance management.
